articles.author: Sky
articles.title: DNA inherited from Neanderthals may impact human nose shape, study finds - Sky News
articles.content:
The shape of modern human noses may be partly determined by genetic material inherited from Neanderthals, according to a new study.
Neanderthals were an ancient species who lived in Eurasia until th… [+3921 chars]

articles.description: Artificial intelligence could pose a "more urgent" threat to humanity than climate change, AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton told Reuters in an interview on Friday.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ariana Garcia
articles.title: Why astronomers spotting a star eat planet is bad news for Earth - Chron
articles.description: For the first time ever, astronomers have discovered a star devouring its own planet. Earth may befall the same fate in the future.
articles.content: For the first time ever, a group of scientists caught a sun-like star devouring a planet. Unfortunately, the discovery may also foreshadow Earth's fate in about five billion years. In a study publish… [+3590 chars]
